startup_tests.details: Game instance created successfully with all required components

grid_generation.details: 10x10 grid generated with correct cell types (boxes, walls, refill stations, fire)

observation_space.details: 10x10 observation matrix generated correctly for RL agents

bot_movement.details: Bot responds to directional movement commands (UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT)

water_refill.details: Water refills correctly at refill stations (MAX_WATER=5)

fire_extinguishing.details: Fire extinguishing mechanism works with 0.5 second delay

fire_spread.details: Fire spreads to adjacent boxes every 5 seconds (30% probability)

action_space_rl.details: RL action space (5 actions) works correctly: UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, EXTINGUISH

performance_test.details: Game runs smoothly at high performance

game_rules_verification.scoring: 100 points per extinguished, -10 points per lost - VERIFIED

conclusion: The vector-fire-extinguish-logic game starts successfully and all basic functionality is working correctly. The game engine is stable with high performance (10,673 steps/second). All RL integration points (observation space, action space, step function) are functioning as specified in the appinfo.json.
